TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImportedFromTypeLibAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ImportedFromTypeLibAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ImportedFromTypeLibAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Indica que los tipos definidos en un ensamblado se definieron originalmente en una biblioteca de tipos.

span.span: Indicates that the types defined within an assembly were originally defined in a type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este atributo se puede aplicar a los ensamblados, aunque la [Tlbimp.exe (importador de la biblioteca de tipos)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) normalmente se aplica automáticamente al que una biblioteca de tipos.You can apply this attribute to assemblies, although the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) typically applies it for you when it a type library. El uso principal del atributo es capturar el origen inicial de la información de tipo.The primary use of the attribute is to capture the original source of the type information. Por ejemplo, puede importar A.tlb. como un ensamblado de interoperabilidad llamado.dll y tener el ensamblado b.dll haga referencia a.dll.For example, you can import A.tlb as an interop assembly called A.dll and have assembly B.dll reference A.dll. Al exportar B.dll a B.tlb, este atributo hace que las referencias de B.tlb que señalan a A.dll señalen en su lugar a A.tlb..When you export B.dll to B.tlb, this attribute causes the references in B.tlb that point to A.dll to point instead to A.tlb. No debe confundirse con el , que especifica que un tipo individual se implementa en COM.This should not be confused with the , which specifies that an individual type is implemented in COM. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CPP/codefile3.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CS/codefile3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ImprovedInteropSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/VB/codefile3.vb#3)]
